name: Christmas Tea Loaf
description: A time-saving addition to your Christmas morning tradition.
preparation: Soak raisins in Christmas Tea. Add vanilla extract and soak for for 30 min.
Sift together flour, sugar, baking powder, Salt and Cinnamon.
Cut butter into flour mixture until it resembles coarse crumbs. Add raisin and Christmas Tea mixture. Mix until just blended.
Pour into a lightly oiled Rectangular Steamer. Bake for 40-50 min, until a skewer inserted into center comes out clean.
Place steamer on a cooling rack for 5 min. Remove loaf from steamer and cool completely.
tips: Make ahead and freeze: Take out the night before to defrost and serve the next morning.

products.name: Cinnamon (Ground)
summary: A simple blend of organic cinnamon that brings the flavor. Great for baking, desserts, egg nog, or enhancing the taste of Middle Eastern and Indian dishes.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
